about.title: About me
presentation: in technologies like React, Node or Tailwind. I love programming, especially in projects that challenge my skills, in order to keep growing as a professional.

description: At Newtech Group I was fortunate to work with a great team that gave me the opportunity to take on a wide range of responsibilities. This experience allowed me to gain a deep understanding of web development. One of the highlights of my time at Newtech was
taking the lead on a migration project

. Not only was I actively involved in coding and technical troubleshooting, but I also took on the role of project leader, supervising and directing two colleagues in the execution of the project. Although this experience was a great challenge,
it boosted my skills as a programmer and my project management
I worked at Skyland as a junior web developer, assisting in the
for a restaurant and ice cream parlor. Customers could view the menu and place orders using their mobile phones

list.title: NewCos
list.description: I worked primarily as a front-end developer, creating screens in the application. One of the functions I worked on (BeComm) scaled up to become a separate product, and since I knew the code best I was chosen to lead the transition.

list.title: BeComm
list.description: BeComm is a solution developed within Microsoft Teams that allows you to administer and manage internal communications with people in your organization in a simple and agile way. For several months I was the main developer of the application, developing new screens and features.

list.title: Tic Tac Toe
list.description: Tic Tac Toc video game with offline and online rooms where you can play with other users. Created using Socket.io.

list.title: Henry Home
list.description: FullStack App Created with other 5 programers using SCRUM method. The app works as a bridge between the host of a house and the guest. Allow creating, review and reserve in the houses.

list.title: PI Videogames
list.description: FullStack App about video games where you can find, filter, order, and create video games using information from an API.
